body:
Hello the people of this server, my name is Dynamo or Yahya and I want to apologize for my ridiculous behaviour. I have said many bad words that actually changed people. I wanted to be someone who was known in this community, however not in the way I thought, I was known for my childish, nasty behaviour. I have made friends into enemies... 

When I got unbanned, I promised pel I wont do anything bad but guess what, I hacked again and I got banned.  I told all the seniors, that I was going to change my actions but I made it worse. I made rumours about staff how they got demoted,and I'm here today, right now making a apology thread.

I'm truly sorry for what I have done, I hope you forgive me.

And for Pelp, sorry dude, I let you done, I hope you forgive me for that <3
body_tagged:
